Hi, Welcome to Single Cell Wizard.

It is a comprehensive web tool which can process Single Cell RNA seq raw FASTQ reads and perform prediction of cell type annotation.
Please visit [Single Cell Wizard](https://www.bhasinlab.us/scw_page/scwiz.php)

**Note:**
This project is currently under development.
